summary: Chappy discovers a drug-smuggling scheme at his own air base. It turns out that the lives of some village people in Peru are at stake, and he decides to fly there with ancient airplanes and friends to free them.
cast: Louis Gossett Jr.|Rachel McLish|Paul Freeman|Horst Buchholz|Christopher Cazenove|Shin'ichi Chiba|Fred Thompson|Mitchell Ryan|Rob Estes|J.E. Freeman|Tom Bower|Phill Lewis|Juan Fernández|Ray 'Boom Boom' Mancini|Inez Perez|Paul Weber|Rick Sky Garcia|Bob Minor|Father Nacho|Nick Gomez|Adrian A. Oviedo|David Herrera|Estrella Reyes|Branscombe Richmond|Marjorie Shields|Fred Smith
title: Águila de acero III
